turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I'd like to order two pizzas from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like them to be medium, both of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure! what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was wondering if they did?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a Margherita pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, a margerita and what is the second one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The second one would be a neapolitan.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what type of crust do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thin crust, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thin crust for both?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you have any special instructions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 medium pizzas. a margerita and neopolitan, thin crust. is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total is $39.87.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 32 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy.
